Change your password manually

  1. Following the instructions for the Web site or program, change your password.
  2. In the Microsoft Windows notification area, typically at the far right of the taskbar, right-click the Citrix Receiver icon and select Passwords > Manage Passwords.
  3. In the Manage Passwords window, select the desired program or Web site and click Edit. Note: Your company might have activated an identity verification process at this point. If so, enter your Windows user name and password when prompted. (If you log on using smart card or other authentication method that does not require a user name and password, use that to verify your identity when prompted.)
  4. In the Password box, select the current contents and type the same password used in Step 1.
  5. Click OK. This saves the new password in Single Sign-on.
